data.title: Full Utility Front B Site ZERO/POINT Execute
data.description: Use this powerful combination of utility to enable your teammates, and yourself, to successfully shut down Defenders playing the B Site. Your knife clears all of Tube and back site.

data.title: Simple Post Plant FRAG/MENT From A Lobby
data.description: This is a simple, but effective post plant FRAG/MENT lineup from A Lobby.
